full.extract:
Mark Steven Spencer (born 20 January 1970)
is an English Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Sherwood.
^ "Mark Spencer MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
full.title: Mark Spencer (politician)
